Trade/Device Name(s): FreeStyle™M Lite Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): FreeStyle™M Lite Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FreeStyle™M Lite Blood Glucose Monitoring System using coulometric biosensor technology for quantitative glucose measurement in whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in whole blood from finger, forearm, upper arm, thigh, calf, and hand; for use by healthcare professionals and people with diabetes at home as an aid in monitoring diabetes control, not for diagnosis or screening, nor for use on neonates or arterial blood
